title: List of rods
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

The following is a list of all [rods](/Rod "Rod") which have existed over previous versions of *Crawl*:

| Rod                                                                                     | Removed in           | Spell A                                                                         | Spell B                                                              | Spell C                                               | Spell D                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Iron rod](/Iron_rod "Iron rod")**                                                    | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Scattershot](/Scattershot "Scattershot")                                       | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod")**                                     | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Thunderbolt](/Thunderbolt "Thunderbolt")                                       | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of clouds](/Rod_of_clouds "Rod of clouds")**                                     | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Cloud Cone](/Cloud_Cone "Cloud Cone")                                          | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of demonology](/Rod_of_demonology "Rod of demonology")**                         | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Call Imp](/Call_Imp "Call Imp")                                                | [Abjuration](/Abjuration "Abjuration")                               | [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")          | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Discovery](/Rod_of_Discovery "Rod of Discovery")**                            | [0.8](/0.8 "0.8")    | [Detect Secret Doors](/Detect_Secret_Doors "Detect Secret Doors")               | [Detect Traps](/Detect_Traps "Detect Traps")                         | [Detect Items](/Detect_Items "Detect Items")          | [Magic Mapping](/Magic_Mapping "Magic Mapping")          |
| **[Rod of fiery destruction](/Rod_of_fiery_destruction "Rod of fiery destruction")**    | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame")                                       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire")                         | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball")                      | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of frigid destruction](/Rod_of_frigid_destruction "Rod of frigid destruction")** | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost")                                       | [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle")                         | [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")    | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of ignition](/Rod_of_ignition "Rod of ignition")**                               | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Explosive Bolt](/Explosive_Bolt "Explosive Bolt")                              | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of inaccuracy](/Rod_of_inaccuracy "Rod of inaccuracy")**                         | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Bolt of Inaccuracy](/Bolt_of_Inaccuracy "Bolt of Inaccuracy")                  | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of shadows](/Rod_of_shadows "Rod of shadows")**                                  | [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") | [Weave Shadows](/Weave_Shadows "Weave Shadows")                                 | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Smiting](/Rod_of_Smiting "Rod of Smiting")**                                  | [0.11](/0.11 "0.11") | [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting")                                                   | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Striking](/Rod_of_Striking "Rod of Striking")**                               | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") | [Striking](/Striking "Striking")                                                | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Summoning](/Rod_of_Summoning "Rod of Summoning")**                            | [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") | [Recall](/Recall "Recall")                                                      | [Call Canine Familiar](/Call_Canine_Familiar "Call Canine Familiar") | [Summon Swarm](/Summon_Swarm "Summon Swarm")          | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Destruction](/Rod_of_Destruction "Rod of Destruction") (fire)**               | [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame")                                       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire")                         | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball")                      | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Destruction](/Rod_of_Destruction "Rod of Destruction") (ice)**                | [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") | [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost")                                       | [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle")                         | [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")    | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Destruction](/Rod_of_Destruction "Rod of Destruction") (inacc, magma, cold)** | [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") | [Bolt of Inaccuracy](/Bolt_of_Inaccuracy "Bolt of Inaccuracy")                  | [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma")                      | [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold")          | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction")**                      | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt")                              | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot")                                  | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball")                      | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction")**                      | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18") | [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt")                                       | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of the swarm](/Rod_of_the_swarm "Rod of the swarm")**                            | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18") | [Summon Swarm](/Summon_Swarm "Summon Swarm")                                    | -                                                                    | -                                                     | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of Venom](/Rod_of_Venom "Rod of Venom")**                                        | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Olgreb's Toxic Radiance](/Olgreb%27s_Toxic_Radiance "Olgreb's Toxic Radiance") | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow")                         | [Poisonous Cloud](/Poisonous_Cloud "Poisonous Cloud") | -                                                        |
| **[Rod of warding](/Rod_of_warding "Rod of warding")**                                  | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") | [Abjuration](/Abjuration "Abjuration")                                          | [Condensation Shield](/Condensation_Shield "Condensation Shield")    | [Cause Fear](/Cause_Fear "Cause Fear")                | [Deflect Missiles](/Deflect_Missiles "Deflect Missiles") |

## History

All remaining rods were removed in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"). The [lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod") was converted to an evocable item, and the [rod of clouds](/Rod_of_clouds "Rod of clouds") and [iron rod](/Iron_rod "Iron rod") were converted to the [wand of clouds](/Wand_of_clouds "Wand of clouds") and [scattershot](/Wand_of_scattershot "Wand of scattershot") respectively.

The rods of [destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction") and [the swarm](/Rod_of_the_swarm "Rod of the swarm") were removed in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

The [rod of striking](/Rod_of_striking "Rod of striking") was replaced by the [iron rod](/Iron_rod "Iron rod") in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16").

The [rod of shadows](/Rod_of_shadows "Rod of shadows") and [rod of clouds](/Rod_of_clouds "Rod of clouds") were both added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
List of rods

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

The following is a list of all rods which have existed over previous versions of Crawl:

Rod Removed in Spell A Spell B Spell C Spell D
Iron rod 0.20 Scattershot - - -
Lightning rod 0.20 Thunderbolt - - -
Rod of clouds 0.20 Cloud Cone - - -
Rod of demonology 0.14 Call Imp Abjuration Summon Demon -
Rod of Discovery 0.8 Detect Secret Doors Detect Traps Detect Items Magic Mapping
Rod of fiery destruction 0.14 Throw Flame Bolt of Fire Fireball -
Rod of frigid destruction 0.14 Throw Frost Throw Icicle Freezing Cloud -
Rod of ignition 0.20 Explosive Bolt - - -
Rod of inaccuracy 0.20 Bolt of Inaccuracy - - -
Rod of shadows 0.20 Weave Shadows - - -
Rod of Smiting 0.11 Smiting - - -
Rod of Striking 0.16 Striking - - -
Rod of Summoning 0.12 Recall Call Canine Familiar Summon Swarm -
Rod of Destruction (fire) 0.13 Throw Flame Bolt of Fire Fireball -
Rod of Destruction (ice) 0.13 Throw Frost Throw Icicle Freezing Cloud -
Rod of Destruction (inacc, magma, cold) 0.13 Bolt of Inaccuracy Bolt of Magma Bolt of Cold -
Rod of destruction 0.14 Lightning Bolt Iron Shot Fireball -
Rod of destruction 0.18 Random Bolt - - -
Rod of the swarm 0.18 Summon Swarm - - -
Rod of Venom 0.14 Olgreb's Toxic Radiance Poison Arrow Poisonous Cloud -
Rod of warding 0.14 Abjuration Condensation Shield Cause Fear Deflect Missiles

History

All remaining rods were removed in 0.20. The lightning rod was converted to an evocable item, and the rod of clouds and iron rod were converted to the wand of clouds and scattershot respectively.

The rods of destruction and the swarm were removed in 0.18.

The rod of striking was replaced by the iron rod in 0.16.

The rod of shadows and rod of clouds were both added in 0.14.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=List_of_rods&oldid=46643"

==History==
All remaining rods were removed in [[0.20]]. The [[lightning rod]] was converted to an evocable item, and the [[rod of clouds]] and [[iron rod]] were converted to the [[wand of clouds]] and [[wand of scattershot|scattershot]] respectively.

The rods of [[rod of destruction|destruction]] and [[rod of the swarm|the swarm]] were removed in [[0.18]].

The [[rod of striking]] was replaced by the [[iron rod]] in [[0.16]]. 

The [[rod of shadows]] and [[rod of clouds]] were both added in [[0.14]].
